org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset

接口 FsVolumeSpi

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.checker.Checkable<FsVolumeSpi.VolumeCheckContext,org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.checker.VolumeCheckResult>

    public interface FsVolumeSpi
extends org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.checker.Checkable<FsVolumeSpi.VolumeCheckContext,org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.checker.VolumeCheckResult>
    This is an interface for the underlying volume.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  FsVolumeSpi.BlockIterator
      BlockIterator will return ExtendedBlock entries from a block pool in this volume.
      static class  FsVolumeSpi.ScanInfo
      Tracks the files and other information related to a block on the disk Missing file is indicated by setting the corresponding member to null.
      static class  FsVolumeSpi.VolumeCheckContext
      Context for the Checkable.check(K) call.

      Release disk space previously reserved for block opened for write.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.checker.Checkable

        check

    • 方法详细资料

      • obtainReference

        FsVolumeReference obtainReference()
                           throws ClosedChannelException
        Obtain a reference object that had increased 1 reference count of the volume. It is caller's responsibility to close FsVolumeReference to decrease the reference count on the volume.
        抛出:
        ClosedChannelException

      • getStorageID

        String getStorageID()
        返回:
        the StorageUuid of the volume

      • getBlockPoolList

        String[] getBlockPoolList()
        返回:
        a list of block pools.

      • getAvailable

        long getAvailable()
           throws IOException
        返回:
        the available storage space in bytes.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getBaseURI

        URI getBaseURI()
        返回:
        the base path to the volume

      • getUsageStats

        org.apache.hadoop.fs.DF getUsageStats(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)

      • getStorageLocation

        org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.StorageLocation getStorageLocation()
        返回:
        the StorageLocation to the volume

      • getStorageType

        org.apache.hadoop.fs.StorageType getStorageType()
        返回:
        the StorageType of the volume

      • isTransientStorage

        boolean isTransientStorage()
        Returns true if the volume is NOT backed by persistent storage.

      • reserveSpaceForReplica

        void reserveSpaceForReplica(long bytesToReserve)
        Reserve disk space for a block (RBW or Re-replicating) so a writer does not run out of space before the block is full.

      • releaseReservedSpace

        void releaseReservedSpace(long bytesToRelease)
        Release disk space previously reserved for block opened for write.

      • releaseLockedMemory

        void releaseLockedMemory(long bytesToRelease)
        Release reserved memory for an RBW block written to transient storage i.e. RAM. bytesToRelease will be rounded down to the OS page size since locked memory reservation must always be a multiple of the page size.

      • newBlockIterator

        FsVolumeSpi.BlockIterator newBlockIterator(String bpid,
                                           String name)
        Create a new block iterator. It will start at the beginning of the block set.
        参数:
        bpid - The block pool id to iterate over.
        name - The name of the block iterator to create.
        返回:
        The new block iterator.

      • loadBlockIterator

        FsVolumeSpi.BlockIterator loadBlockIterator(String bpid,
                                            String name)
                                     throws IOException
        Load a saved block iterator.
        参数:
        bpid - The block pool id to iterate over.
        name - The name of the block iterator to load.
        返回:
        The saved block iterator.
        抛出:
        IOException - If there was an IO error loading the saved block iterator.

      • getDataset

        org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.FsDatasetSpi getDataset()
        Get the FSDatasetSpi which this volume is a part of.

      • loadLastPartialChunkChecksum

        byte[] loadLastPartialChunkChecksum(File blockFile,
                                    File metaFile)
                             throws IOException
        Load last partial chunk checksum from checksum file. Need to be called with FsDataset lock acquired.
        参数:
        blockFile -
        metaFile -
        返回:
        the last partial checksum
        抛出:
        IOException

      • compileReport

        LinkedList<FsVolumeSpi.ScanInfo> compileReport(String bpid,
                                               LinkedList<FsVolumeSpi.ScanInfo> report,
                                               DirectoryScanner.ReportCompiler reportCompiler)
                                        throws InterruptedException,
                                               IOException
        Compile a list of FsVolumeSpi.ScanInfo for the blocks in the block pool with id bpid.
        参数:
        bpid - block pool id to scan
        report - the list onto which blocks reports are placed
        reportCompiler -
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • getFileIoProvider

        org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.FileIoProvider getFileIoProvider()

      • getMetrics

        org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.fsdataset.DataNodeVolumeMetrics getMetrics()
